content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
What are the top news stories from today?

Here are some of the top news stories from today:

1. **House GOP Pulls Budget Resolution**: The Republican leadership in the House has pulled a budget resolution, indicating a lack of support and votes within the party. [Read more here.](https://thehill.com/homenews/house/5164168-house-gop-leaders-pull-budget-resolution/)

2. **Newly Discovered Asteroid Will Bypass Earth**: A newly identified asteroid has been confirmed to bypass Earth, alleviating concerns about a potential impact. [Read more here.](https://www.voanews.com/a/newly-discovered-asteroid-will-bypass-earth-/7988316.html)

If you’d like more details on any of these stories, feel free to ask!
